definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: make bent, press or bend together (NH Hiph. id.; [[כָּפַשׁ]] furnish  a vessel with a bent rim, [[כּוֹפֶשׁ]] a broad-rimmed vessel; Ar. kafisa have bent or crooked feet; Tel Am. kappâšu, sole of foot Dl:HWB 348 (doubtfully), but inf. fr. [[כבשׁ]] acc. to Wkl:Tel Am. Letters, Vocab.);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[בָּאֵפֶרהִכְפִּישַׁנִי]] La 3:16 he made me cower in the ashes.
